channel.title: Portal Teleporting
channel.description:
My post is more of a question than a problem.
I am using the U-Rune base by Kihomura, and I want it so that when I click on a portal, it will teleport me to wherever I specify.
So, would I put the case label in the ObjectClick class or somewhere else? If it does go in the ObjectClick class, would it work if I put it under [code] public static void objectClick [/code]?
Also, would the code to make it teleport from another base, say Allstar for example, work in the U-Rune base or am I going to have to make it from scratch?
Answers are appreciated. =]

item.title: Portal Teleporting
item.dc:creator: @xPetrix xPetrix
item.description:
@xPetrix wrote:

My post is more of a question than a problem.

I am using the U-Rune base by Kihomura, and I want it so that when I click on a portal, it will teleport me to wherever I specify.

So, would I put the case label in the ObjectClick class or somewhere else?
If it does go in the ObjectClick class, would it work if I put it under

public static void objectClick ?

Also, would the code to make it teleport from another base, say Allstar for example, work in the U-Rune base or am I going to have to make it from scratch?
